meanings.definition: Not able to be changed or altered.
meanings.sent1: The rules of the game were unmodifiable, so we had to play by them.
meanings.sent2: The unmodifiable design of the building made it difficult to renovate.
meanings.sent3: His unmodifiable insistence on eating pizza for breakfast always made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unmodifiable loyalty to her friends was like a rock in a stormy sea.
meanings.sent5: The unmodifiable mountain stood tall against the changing sky.

meanings.sent1: The software had unmodifiable settings that could not be adjusted.
meanings.sent2: The unmodifiable contract terms were clearly stated and could not be changed.
meanings.sent3: His unmodifiable routine of wearing mismatched socks always amused his coworkers.
meanings.sent4: The unmodifiable truth of the matter was like a bright light in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The unmodifiable decision was etched in stone, unchanging and final.
